Text: how would i do a dvdrip and squash each episode down to 350mb, when ever i've tried quality goes out the window, plz help.

@banny1984 i make a copy of the disc first using dvd decrypter and then use a free converter an older version of handbrake and find i get good copies there is also a free converter called freemake that copies straight from the original disc and thats quite good
thanks for the help, much appreciated
DONT DOWNLOAD From episode 11-22 there are 2 red vertical lines going across the screen for the whole episode. Unless you  can bear through those DONT DOWNLOAD.

@icy100 are you sure its not your computer as i don't have 2 red lines on my copies on my tv or computer and i think out of the thousands that have downloaded it someone else would have been sure to have noticed it
